title: Marketing Manager
description:
We are seeking an experienced Marketing Manager to lead our client's marketing team in Kigali. The ideal candidate will have 5+ years of experience in digital marketing and team leadership.

## Responsibilities:
- Develop and execute marketing strategies
- Manage digital marketing campaigns
- Lead a team of 5 marketing professionals
- Analyze market trends and competitor activity
- Prepare marketing budgets and reports

## Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or related field
- Proven experience in digital marketing
- Strong leadership and communication skills
- Experience in the Rwandan market preferred

title: Agricultural Processing Investment Opportunity
description:
Investment opportunity in a modern agricultural processing plant specializing in fruit and vegetable processing. The plant is already operational with established supply chains.

## Investment Details:
- Seeking $500,000 investment for expansion
- Current capacity: 10 tons per day
- Expansion target: 30 tons per day
- ROI projection: 25% annually
- Exit strategy available after 5 years

## Market Opportunity:
- Growing demand for processed foods in Rwanda
- Export potential to neighboring countries
- Government support for agri-processing
- Established buyer contracts in place
benefits: Board seat available for major investors

title: Technology Partnership for E-commerce Platform
description:
Seeking technology partner for joint development of an e-commerce platform targeting Rwandan SMEs. We have the business model and initial funding, need technical co-founder.

## Partnership Details:
- Equity-based partnership opportunity
- We provide: Business plan, initial funding, market access
- You provide: Technical development, platform architecture
- Target launch: Q3 2025

## Technical Requirements:
- Full-stack development experience
- Mobile app development (Flutter/React Native)
- Payment gateway integration experience
- Cloud infrastructure knowledge (AWS/Azure)
- Previous e-commerce projects preferred
requirements: Based in or willing to relocate to Rwanda

title: Sales Representatives (Multiple Positions)
description:
Urgently hiring sales representatives for FMCG distribution company. Positions available in Kigali, Musanze, and Huye.

## Position Details:
- Sell fast-moving consumer goods to retailers
- Build and maintain customer relationships
- Achieve monthly sales targets
- Report to area sales manager
- Company-provided sales training

## Requirements:
- High school diploma minimum
requirements: Sales experience preferred but not required

title: Tourism Lodge Business for Sale
description:
Well-established tourism lodge in Musanze district near Volcanoes National Park. Perfect for investor looking to enter Rwanda's growing tourism sector.

## Business Details:
- 12 guest rooms with ensuite bathrooms
- Restaurant and bar facility
- Conference/event space
- Established since 2018
- Loyal customer base (70% repeat guests)
- Annual revenue: $180,000
- Asking price: $450,000 (negotiable)

## Assets Included:
- Land lease (15 years remaining)
- All furniture and equipment
- Vehicle for guest transfers
- Business licenses and permits
- Staff trained and ready
- Website and booking system
requirements: Legal capacity to operate business in Rwanda
benefits: High growth potential in Rwandan tourism

title: Finance Officer
description:
Finance Officer position available at growing microfinance institution in Kigali. Responsible for financial reporting, budgeting, and compliance.

## Key Responsibilities:
- Prepare monthly financial statements
- Manage accounts payable and receivable
- Assist with budget preparation
- Ensure regulatory compliance
- Support audit processes

## Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or related
- CPA/ACCA qualification or in progress
- 3+ years experience in finance role
- Proficiency in accounting software
- Knowledge of Rwandan financial regulations
- Excellent attention to detail
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or related
